name: Impasse
description:
.

Impasse is a 15 to 30 minutes game, similar to a visual novel, about introspection and identity. It focuses on telling a non-linear story through simple choices and interactions: the player is presented before 3 doors, and has to decide in which order to explore them.

I would love to have your opinion, be it negative or positive, and all feedback will be thoroughly enjoyed!

By Sebastien Violier (sviolier.com).
Many thanks to N. Metzger for the music.
